description:
Shows actual charging/discharging consumption (+/-) in Watts next to battery percentage level and/or battery time remaining.
Enable percentage label when disabled.
Default sync reload set to 4 seconds.
No consumption info when battery is full.
Settings: interval, percentage label (also when full), time remaining on/off, battery selection.
